description: The initiative focuses on a dairy cooperative known as Choza, which produces organic and biodynamic dairy products. Established 25 years ago, it operates with a community-driven model, emphasizing sustainable practices and animal welfare. The cooperative involves around 30 members who share profits and responsibilities, fostering a collaborative environment. They aim to expand production while adhering to biodynamic principles, ensuring the health of the land and livestock, and maintaining strong ties with other cooperatives and local communities.
name: La Choza
